Text: Say, this does actually work. But only afte I applied the patch.

It works fine don't know why -2.

1. Unzip the .zip file and mount the .cue file in Daemon Tool Lite.
2. When the pop up comes up asking if you want to run setup choose to view the files instead.
3. Run the setup from the folder but keep the folder open.
4. Navigate to the Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade folder in Program Files.
5. Copy over and replace the Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade.exe file from the Bugfix folder inside the crack folder on the mounted disc.
6. Play an awesome old school game!
4.
